message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great price, and I think you'll really love it!

Thank you for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to try to get as close to my budget as possible.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer! I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $10500 is a more reasonable price for this amazing product. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand that you want to get a fair price for the product, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I think $9500 is the maximum I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm not overspending.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer! I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I still think the product is worth more than $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $10200. I think this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm really interested in the product.
